verses.verse: But now thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> that created<WH1254> you<WH3290>, O Jacob, and he that formed<WH3335> you<WH3478>, O Israel, Fear<WH3372> not<WH1350>: for I have redeemed you<WH7121>, I have called you by your name<WH8034>; you are mine.

When you pass through<WH5674> the waters<WH4325>, I will be with you<WH5104>; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow<WH7857> you<WH3212>: when you walk through<WH1119> the fire<WH784>, you shall not be burned<WH3554>; neither shall the flame<WH3852> kindle upon you<WH1197>.

For I am the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>, your Savior<WH3467>: I gave<WH5414> Egypt<WH4714> for your ransom<WH3724>, Ethiopia<WH3568> and Seba for you<WH5434>.

Since you were precious<WH3365> in my sight<WH5869>, you have been honorable<WH3513>, and I have loved<WH157> you<WH5414>: therefore will I give men<WH120> for you<WH3816>, and people for your life<WH5315>.
Fear<WH3372> not<WH935>: for I am with you: I will bring your seed<WH2233> from the east<WH4217>, and gather<WH6908> you from the west<WH4628>;

I will say<WH559> to the north<WH6828>, Give up<WH5414>; and to the south<WH8486>, Keep not back<WH3607>: bring<WH935> my sons<WH1121> from far<WH7350>, and my daughters<WH1323> from the ends<WH7097> of the earth<WH776>;
Even every one<WH3605> that is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>: for I have created<WH1254> him for my glory<WH3519>, I have formed<WH3335> him<WH6213>; Yes, I have made him.
Bring forth<WH3318> the blind<WH5787> people<WH5971> that have<WH3426> eyes<WH5869>, and the deaf<WH2795> that have ears<WH241>.

Let all the nations<WH1471> be gathered<WH6908> together<WH3162>, and let the people<WH3816> be assembled<WH622>: who among them can declare<WH5046> this<WH8085>, and show us former things<WH7223>? let them bring forth<WH5414> their witnesses<WH5707>, that they may be justified<WH6663>: or let them hear<WH8085>, and say<WH559>, It is truth<WH571>.

You are my witnesses<WH5707>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, and my servant<WH5650> whom I have chosen<WH977>: that you may know<WH3045> and believe<WH539> me<WH995>, and understand that I am he<WH6440>: before me there was no God<WH410> formed<WH3335>, neither shall there be after me<WH310>.
I<WH3068>, even I, am the Lord; and beside<WH1107> me there is no savior<WH3467>.

I have declared<WH5046>, and have saved<WH3467>, and I have shown<WH8085>, when there was no strange<WH2114> god among you<WH5707>: therefore you are my witnesses, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, that I am God<WH410>.
Yes<WH3117>, before the day was I am he<WH5337>; and there is none that can deliver out of my hand<WH3027>: I will work<WH6466>, and who shall let it<WH7725>?

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>, your redeemer<WH1350>, the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>; For your sake I have sent<WH7971> to Babylon<WH894>, and have brought down<WH3381> all their nobles<WH1281>, and the Chaldeans<WH3778>, whose cry<WH7440> is in the ships<WH591>.
I am the Lord<WH3068>, your Holy One<WH6918>, the creator<WH1254> of Israel<WH3478>, your King<WH4428>.
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>, which makes<WH5414> a way<WH1870> in the sea<WH3220>, and a path<WH5410> in the mighty<WH5794> waters<WH4325>;

Which brings forth<WH3318> the chariot<WH7393> and horse<WH5483>, the army<WH2428> and the power<WH5808>; they shall lie down<WH7901> together<WH3162>, they shall not rise<WH6965>: they are extinct<WH1846>, they are quenched<WH3518> as a wick<WH6594>.
Remember<WH2142> you not the former things<WH7223>, neither consider<WH995> the things of old<WH6931>.

Behold<WH6213>, I will do a new thing<WH2319>; now it shall spring forth<WH6779>; shall you not know<WH3045> it<WH7760>? I will even make a way<WH1870> in the wilderness<WH4057>, and rivers<WH5104> in the desert<WH3452>.

The animal<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> shall honor<WH3513> me<WH8577>, the dragons and the owls<WH1323>: because I give<WH5414> waters<WH4325> in the wilderness<WH4057>, and rivers<WH5104> in the desert<WH3452>, to give drink<WH8248> to my people<WH5971>, my chosen<WH972>.
This<WH2098> people<WH5971> have I formed<WH3335> for myself<WH5608>; they shall show forth my praise<WH8416>.
But you have not called<WH7121> upon me<WH3290>, O Jacob; but you have been weary<WH3021> of me<WH3478>, O Israel.

You have not brought<WH935> me the small sheep<WH7716> of your burnt offerings<WH5930>; neither have you honored<WH3513> me with your sacrifices<WH2077>. I have not caused you to serve<WH5647> with a offering<WH4503>, nor wearied<WH3021> you with incense<WH3828>.

You have bought<WH7069> me no sweet cane<WH7070> with money<WH3701>, neither have you filled<WH7301> me with the fat<WH2459> of your sacrifices<WH2077>: but you have made me to serve<WH5647> with your sins<WH2403>, you have wearied<WH3021> me with your iniquities<WH5771>.
I<WH4229>, even I, am he that blots out your transgressions<WH6588> for my own sake<WH2142>, and will not remember your sins<WH2403>.
Put me in memory<WH2142>: let us plead<WH8199> together<WH3162>: declare<WH5608> you<WH6663>, that you may be justified.
Your first<WH7223> father<WH1> has sinned<WH2398>, and your teachers<WH3887> have transgressed against me<WH6586>.
Therefore I have profaned<WH2490> the princes<WH8269> of the sanctuary<WH6944>, and have given<WH5414> Jacob<WH3290> to the curse<WH2764>, and Israel<WH3478> to reproaches<WH1421>.
